text:
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
Could you clarify the categorisation of the following waste streams (whether under ESRS E5
paragraph 37 (b) (iii), (c) (ii) or (c) (iii))? Composting of organic waste, fermentation of organic
waste and incineration of waste that results in energy production (which then is used/sold).
ESRS Reference
ESRS E5-5
Key terms
Waste stream, categorisation of
Background
